title: Rectangular Object (measured in variable unit)
description: This is an abstract schema for objects of rectangular dimensions and position, with a user-specified unit of measurement. Examples include `Artboard` and `Layer`.

xdm:originX.title: Origin X
xdm:originX.description: Origin X position - base system is cartesian, relative to master page and origin in top, left (X increasing to right, Y increasing downwards).

xdm:originY.title: Origin Y
xdm:originY.description: Origin Y position - base system is cartesian, relative to master page and origin in top, left (X increasing to right, Y increasing downwards).

xdm:unit.title: Unit
xdm:unit.description: Unit used for artboard coordinates (`originX`, `originY`, `width` and `height`). For example: `inch`, `mm`, `pixel`, `pica`, `point` (default is `pixel`).
